mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT AST.DOC_NO AS DOC_TEMP_NO, AD.DOC_NO, AF.FORM_CODE, AD.DTITLE, AD.DCONTENT, AD.FILENAME, AD.DRAFTER_NO, M.NAME AS DRAFTER_NAME, AD.DRAFTER_DEPT_NO, D.DEPT_NAME AS DRAFTER_DEPT_NAME, AD.DRAFTER_RANK_NO, R.RANK_NAME AS DRAFTER_RANK_NAME, AD.DRAFT_DATE, AD.COMPLETE_DATE, AD.FORM_NO, AF.FORM_NAME, AD.TURN_NO, AD.R_STATUS, AD.D_STATUS FROM APPROVAL_DOCUMENT AD JOIN MEMBER M ON(AD.DRAFTER_NO = M.MEM_NO) JOIN APPROVAL_FORM AF ON(AD.FORM_NO = AF.FORM_NO) JOIN APPROVAL_STEP AST ON(AD.DOC_TEMP_NO = AST.DOC_NO) JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON(AD.DRAFTER_DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO) JOIN RANK R ON(AD.DRAFTER_RANK_NO = R.RANK_NO) WHERE AD.D_STATUS = 'N' AND AD.COMPLETE_DATE IS NULL AND AD.DOC_NO IS NOT NULL AND (AD.DRAFTER_NO = #{memNo} OR AST.STAFF_NO = #{memNo}) ORDER BY AD.DRAFT_DATE DESC)
